spatial_accuracy.notes: Excellent layout adherence. Minor wall alignment issues near the foyer and utility area. Door swings are generally correct but some internal transitions are slightly simplified/missing thresholds.

structural_fidelity.notes: All rooms present. No text or UI elements found. The model is correctly floating on a dark neutral background. Partial deduction for slight reinterpretations of the wall thicknesses in the kitchen/utility transition.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement is highly accurate to the source plan. Scale is consistent. Kitchen counters and block-style furniture are well-executed.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Good low-poly style with flat shading. Camera is isometric but slightly tilted off the strict 45-degree center on the horizontal axis.

detected_errors.description: Minor layout distortion in the foyer wall alignment compared to the 2D plan.
Slight structural reinterpretation of the utility room access wall.
